full_text: Evidence is growing that covid-­19 attacks the body broadly, and is most exacerbated by illnesses that cause inflammation or affect the circulatory system, such as kidney, liver or heart problems https://t.co/gakhs43VP7

localize.full_text: 越来越多的证据表明，covid-19对身体的攻击范围很广，最严重的是引起炎症或影响循环系统的疾病，如肾脏、肝脏或心脏问题https://t.co/gakhs43VP7。
越來越多的證據表明，covid-19對身體的攻擊範圍很廣，最嚴重的是引起炎症或影響循環系統的疾病，如腎臟、肝臟或心臟問題https://t.co/gakhs43VP7。
